doc.title: Dropping a Ton and Making It Fun!!
doc.plot: Weight Loss and Cancer, what could be more relevant for everyone today than Weight Loss and Cancer. 50% of the younger generations will have an incident with Cancer , more than that, some form of obesity. 'Cancer is Simple!!!', and so can Healthy Weight Loss be if you use the right tools. Dropping a Ton and Making it Fun is an exciting flowing reality docu-comedy that follows an individual on his weight loss challenge from 370lbs down to 180lbs. 20 interviews with holistic greats such as; Dr. Masaru Emoto(Messages from Water), Dr. Robert O Young(pH Miracle Center), Dr. Brian Clement (Hippocrates Institute), and more. Sharing eternal truths of super nutrition (acid/alkaline foods,enzymes , healthy waters, etc..). 'Cancer IS Simple!!' 'Weight Loss can be 'Fun'...this is a film to see!! Trailer on You Tube/Google.
